The correct answer is C: A black screen with yellow text reading "Il Sistema Operativo GNU/Linux." 

This answer is based on the description provided in the audio transcript. The speaker mentions that during event 2, there is a visual shown on the screen that represents the importance of the free software movement. This visual is described as a black screen with yellow text reading "Il Sistema Operativo GNU/Linux," which translates to "GNU/Linux Operating System" in English. This image is associated with the free software community and their fight for open-source software.
The sound heard when the man is embraced by another person at the end of the segment is option D: a soft wind chime sound.
